fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] You have been registered for {{summit_name}}
fields.html_content:
Congratulations {{ order_owner_full_name }} has purchased the below ticket(s) for you to attend {{ summit_name }}. In order to claim your ticket, you must fill in the required details. Your registration information is below:

{{ ticket_number }}

  • Type: {{ ticket_type_name }}
  • Attendee: {{ owner_email }}
  • Promo Code: {% if promo_code is defined and promo_code|length %} ({{ promo_code }}) {% else %} None {% endif %}
  • Price: {{ ticket_currency_symbol }}{{ ticket_amount }} {{ ticket_currency }}
    • {% if need_details is defined and need_details is sameas true %}
  • Additional Information Required to Issue Ticket
    • {% endif %}

Your ticket *HAS NOT* been issued yet. You must claim your ticket by filling in the required details before your ticket can be issued. Please click the button below to enter your details:

We look forward to issuing your ticket and seeing you at {{ summit_name }} If you have any questions please contact the {{ summit_name }} support team at {{ support_email }}.

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Order Confirmation for {{summit_name}}
fields.html_content:
Hey {{ owner_full_name }} thank you for purchasing ticket(s) to attend {{ summit_name }}. This is your order confirmation and your order details are below:

  • Order Number: {{ order_number }}
  • Price: {{ order_currency_symbol }}{{ order_amount }} {{ order_currency }}

Tickets Included:

    {% for ticket in tickets %}
  • {{ ticket.number }}
    • Type: {{ ticket.ticket_type_name }}
    • {% if ticket.has_owner is defined and ticket.has_owner is sameas true %} Attendee: {{ ticket.owner_email }} {% else %} Attendee: UNASSIGNED {% endif %}
    • Promo Code: {% if ticket.promo_code is defined %} ({{ ticket.promo_code.code }}) {% else %} None {% endif %}
    • Price: {{ticket.currency_symbol}}{{ ticket.price }} {{ ticket.currency}}
      • {% if ticket.need_details is defined and ticket.need_details is sameas true %}
    • Additional Information Required to Issue Ticket
      • {% endif %}
    • {% endfor %}

PLEASE NOTE! Tickets must be assigned and all attendee details must be entered to issue the ticket.

If the ticket is already assigned the attendee will have received an email to enter attendee details.

If the ticket has not been assigned then when assigned the attendee will receive an email to enter attendee details.

If you prefer to add the required attendee information yourself, you may do so on the manage orders page.

Once all information is entered, the ticket will be issued and emailed to the assigned attendee.

Thank you again for your purchase, we look forward to seeing your attendees at {{ summit_name }}. If you have any questions please contact the {{ summit_name }} support team at {{ support_email }}.

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Your registration for {{summit_name}} has been cancelled
fields.html_content:
Hey {{ owner_full_name }}, your registration for {{ summit_name }} has been cancelled or reassigned. You are no longer registered to attend this event. We hope to see you at a future event. If you believe this was a mistake please contact {{ support_email }}.

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Order Confirmation for {{summit_name}}
fields.html_content:
Hey {{ owner_full_name }} thank you for purchasing ticket(s) to attend {{ summit_name }}.

There is no account in our system associated with your email address. In order to manage your order (assign tickets, edit attendee details, request a refund, etc.) you will need to create an account. Simply click the button below to create an account and manage this order:

This is your order confirmation and your order details are below:

  • Order Number: {{ order_number }}
  • Price: {{ order_currency_symbol }}{{ order_amount }} {{ order_currency }}

Tickets Included:

    {% for ticket in tickets %}

    • Type: {{ ticket.ticket_type_name }}
    • {% if ticket.has_owner is defined and ticket.has_owner is sameas true %} Attendee: {{ ticket.owner_email }} {% else %} Attendee: UNASSIGNED {% endif %}
    • Promo Code: {% if ticket.promo_code is defined %} ({{ ticket.promo_code.code }}) {% else %} None {% endif %}
    • Price: {{ ticket.currency_symbol }{{ ticket.price}} {{ ticket.currency }}
      • {% if ticket.need_details is defined and ticket.need_details is sameas true %}
    • Additional Information Required to Issue Ticket
      • {% endif %}
    • {% endfor %}

PLEASE NOTE! Tickets must be assigned and all attendee details must be entered to issue the ticket.

If the ticket is already assigned the attendee will have received an email to enter attendee details.

If the ticket has not been assigned then when assigned the attendee will receive an email to enter attendee details.

If you prefer to add the required attendee information yourself, you may do so on the manage orders page.

Once all information is entered, the ticket will be issued and emailed to the assigned attendee.

(requires an account)

Thank you again for your purchase, we look forward to seeing your attendees at {{ summit_name }}. If you have any questions please contact the {{ summit_name }} support team at {{ support_email }}.

Thank you!
{{ summit_name }} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Presentation Received
fields.html_content:
Hello {{creator_full_name}} --

Thank you for your submission to the {{selection_plan_name}} at {{summit_name}}, {{summit_date}}.

Session details can be found here: {{presentation_edit_link}}

IMPORTANT! Please take some time to review your Speaker Profile.

SO WHAT HAPPENS NEXT AND WHEN WILL I BE NOTIFIED?

The Call for Presentations will remain open until {{until_date}}. The Programming Committee will follow the selection process.

CAN I EDIT MY SUBMISSIONS OR ADD NEW ONES?
Absolutely. You can continue to edit your submissions or add new ones until {{until_date}}. Please go to {{speaker_management_link}}

WHAT IF I DON’T KNOW MY PASSWORD?
Your password can be reset here: {{reset_password_link}}

WHAT IF I HAVE ADDITIONAL QUESTIONS?
Please feel free to contact us at {{support_email}}

Thanks again! We look forward to seeing you at {{summit_name}}.

Sincerely,

{{summit_name}} Support Team

fields.html_content:

The session details can be found here: {{presentation_edit_link}}

CAN I EDIT MY SUBMISSIONS OR ADD NEW ONES?
Absolutely. You can continue to edit your submissions or add new ones until {{until_date}}. Please go to {{speaker_management_link}}

WHAT IF I DON’T KNOW MY PASSWORD?

WHAT IF I HAVE ADDITIONAL QUESTIONS?
Please feel free to contact us at {{support_email}}

Thanks again! We look forward to seeing you at {{summit_name}}.

Sincerely,

{{summit_name}} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Session Accepted
fields.html_content:
Hello {{speaker_fullname}} --

Congratulations, at least one of your submissions has been accepted for the {{summit_name}}!

In order to confirm yourself as a speaker, you must complete the following steps.

Step One
Confirm you are able and approved to travel to attend the Summit and present the selected talk by clicking this confirmation link: {{speaker_confirmation_link}}}

Step Two
Register for the Summit using this registration code ({{{promo_code}}}) to receive your complimentary {{ticket_type}} ticket. Please be sure to select the {{ticket_type}} ticket type before you enter your discount code.

  • In order to register for free, please note this unique and single use code must be used by {{promo_code_until_date}}.

Sessions accepted for the {{summit_name}}:

    {% for presentation in accepted_presentations %}
  • {{presentation.title}}
    • {% endfor %}

Helpful Links:

  • Review the full {{summit_name}} schedule
  • Update your Speaker Profile

Cheers,

{{summit_name}} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Submission Update
fields.html_content:

Thank you for submitting a speaking proposal for the {{summit_name}}. We received an incredible amount of speaking submissions, and had to make some tough decisions for the schedule.

Unfortunately, your submission was not chosen to be part of the official agenda this time around. You submitted:

    {% for presentation in rejected_presentations %}
  • {{presentation.title}}
    • {% endfor %}

Thank you so much for your contribution to the {{summit_name}}, we look forward to seeing you at {{summit_name}}!

Cheers,

{{summit_name}} Support Team

fields.subject: [{{summit_name}}] Submission Update
fields.html_content:
Hello {{speaker_fullname}} --

Thank you for submitting a speaking proposal for the {{summit_name}}.

At least one of your submissions has been selected as a Lightning Talk (10 minute). This session has also been designated as an Alternate, which means it may be added to the agenda as a full, 40 minute breakout session, if other sessions don't work out. We will proactively reach out to you if a full breakout slot becomes available for your session.

In order to confirm your availability as a lightning talk speaker and an official alternate, you must complete the following steps.

Step One
Confirm you are able and approved to travel to attend the Summit and present the selected talk by clicking this confirmation link: {{speaker_confirmation_link}}}

Step Two
Register for the Summit using this registration code ({{{promo_code}}}) to receive your complimentary {{ticket_type}} ticket. Please be sure to select the {{ticket_type}} ticket type before you enter your discount code.

  • In order to register for free, please note this unique and single use code must be used by {{promo_code_until_date}}.

Sessions selected as a Lightning Talk and Alternate for the {{summit_name}}:

    {% for presentation in alternate_presentations %}
  • {{presentation.title}}
    • {% endfor %}

Unfortunately, these submissions were not chosen to be part of the official agenda:

    {% for presentation in rejected_presentations %}
  • {{presentation.title}}
    • {% endfor %}

Helpful Links:

  • Review the full {{summit_name}} schedule
  • Update your Speaker Profile

Cheers,

{{summit_name}} Support Team

Additionally, at least one of your submissions has been selected as a Lightning Talk (10 minute). This session has also been designated as an Alternate, which means it may be added to the agenda as a full, 40 minute breakout session, if other sessions do not work out. We will proactively reach out to you if a full breakout slot becomes available for your session.

In order to confirm yourself as a speaker, you must complete the following steps.

Step One
Confirm you are able and approved to travel to attend the Summit and present the selected talk by clicking this confirmation link: {{speaker_confirmation_link}}}

Step Two
Register for the Summit using this registration code ({{{promo_code}}}) to receive your complimentary {{ticket_type}} ticket. Please be sure to select the {{ticket_type}} ticket type before you enter your discount code.

  • In order to register for free, please note this unique and single use code must be used by {{promo_code_until_date}}.
